Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent assessment he has made of the situation in Syria.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What assessment he has made of recent developments relating to Gibraltar.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What assessment he has made of the latest prospects for the Middle East Peace Process; and if he will make a statement.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent assessment he has made of the prospects for fully normalising relations between Serbia and Kosovo.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What support his Department has provided to projects fostering co-existence between Israelis and Palestinians.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent assessment he has made of the security and political situation in Jordan and Lebanon.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent discussions he has had with the government of India on the non-payment of invoices submitted by Satellite Information Services following their coverage of the 2010 Commonwealth Games.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent representations he has made to the Chinese government on human rights.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What advice his Department has given to UK businesses on trading with illegal Israeli settlements.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent assessment he has made of freedom of the press in Turkey.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent assessment he has made of the situation in Syria.

Question.Text: What recent assessment he has made of the situation in Syria.

Question.Text: What recent discussions he has had on the threat from terrorist groups, organised crime and piracy in West Africa.

Question.Text: What recent assessment he has made of the situation in Syria.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What discussions he has had with the UN Special Envoy for the Great Lakes on the situation in the eastern region of the Democratic Republic of Congo.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What plans he has to increase the role of national parliaments in the EU.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent assessment he has made of the situation in Egypt; and if he will make a statement.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent discussions he has had with the expatriate Chagossian community about his policy on the future of the Chagos Islands.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What recent assessment he has made of the situation in Egypt; and if he will make a statement.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: If he will publish his objectives for his discussions with the premiers and chief ministers of the UK Overseas Territories at the forthcoming Joint Ministerial Council.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What progress he has made with his Department's EU balance of competences review.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What reports he has received on the recent elections in Mali and on that country's roadmap for political reform.

Question.Department: Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Question.Text: What assessment he has made of the recent elections in Zimbabwe; and if he will make a statement.

Question.Text: If he will make a statement on his departmental responsibilities.
